Method Detail

router

@RequestMapping(value="/router",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView router(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                                          java.util.Locale locale)
                                                    throws UnAnnotatedRemoteMethodException
This is main router method with defualt RequestMapping /router. This is main entry point for all requests form and non form submits using ExtJS remoting.

Parameters:
request -
response -
locale -
Returns:
Throws:
UnAnnotatedRemoteMethodException

remotingFormPostModelAndView

protected org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView remotingFormPostModelAndView(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                    boolean isSuccess,
                                                                                    java.util.Locale locale,
                                                                                    org.springframework.context.MessageSource messageSource,
                                                                                    java.lang.String mainMessage,
                                                                                    org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
This method needs to be called by class which extends this ExtJS remoting form handling methods.

Parameters:
request -
isSuccess - Flag stating if the form submission completed successfully.
locale - Can be null
messageSource - - Can be null, Message resource object which has internationalized messages for form field validation failures. This method preserves Springs validation error handling on form submissions and displays field errors using ExtJS native field error rendering.
mainMessage - Can be null, A Message which is passed back to browser and can be used to display form submission message. The message is passed in the return JSON but it is up to the developer to display it part of the form submit callback.
bindingResult - Can be null
Returns:

getFormLoadObject

protected ExtJsFormResultWrapperBean getFormLoadObject(java.lang.Object resultObject)
This method returns a wrapper used to encapsulate the domain object which pertains to a form in ExtJS. The return object in any methods used to load forms must be wrapped using this.

Parameters:
resultObject -
Returns:
